stories.title: Add updateGoal method to GoalsRepository and create UpdateGoalUseCase in lib/features/goals/domain/usecases/update_goal_usecase.dart
stories.description:
Extend the GoalsRepository interface and GoalsRemoteDatasource implementation with updateGoal method, then create the UpdateGoalUseCase following the existing CreateGoalUseCase pattern.

- You can ONLY create/modify files listed below

- Modify: lib/features/goals/domain/repositories/goals_repository.dart, lib/features/goals/data/datasources/goals_remote_datasource.dart
- Create: lib/features/goals/domain/usecases/update_goal_usecase.dart

ğŸ”§ **PATTERNS TO USE:**
- Use `CreateGoalUseCase` from lib/features/goals/domain/usecases/create_goal_usecase.dart as template
- Repository method signature: `Future<GroupGoal> updateGoal({required String goalId, String? name, String? description, int? targetSteps, DateTime? startDate, DateTime? endDate})`
- Follow existing GoalsRemoteDatasourceImpl pattern for API call using `_client.put()`
- Use `ApiEndpoints.withParams(ApiEndpoints.goalDetails, {'id': goalId})` for endpoint URL

ğŸ“¦ **REQUIRED STRUCTURE:**
- Repository interface method with proper docs and exceptions
- Datasource implementation with PUT request
- UseCase class with call() method accepting optional update parameters

âš ï¸ **ANTI-PATTERNS TO AVOID:**
- Creating a new datasource class instead of extending existing GoalsRemoteDatasourceImpl
- Using POST instead of PUT for update operations
- Not following the existing error handling pattern with ServerException

ğŸ¯ **FUNCTIONAL REQUIREMENTS:**
- updateGoal must be async and return updated GroupGoal
- All parameters except goalId should be optional (partial update)
- Use ISO8601 format for date serialization (toIso8601String())

ğŸ§ª **VERIFICATION:**
- Run: flutter analyze lib/features/goals/
- Check: No analysis errors
- Verify: UpdateGoalUseCase follows same structure as CreateGoalUseCase
acceptanceCriteria: Given the GoalsRepository interface, when updateGoal method is added, then it accepts goalId (required) and optional name, description, targetSteps, startDate, endDate parameters
Given the GoalsRemoteDatasource, when updateGoal is implemented, then it sends a PUT request to /goals/:id endpoint with the provided fields
Given the UpdateGoalUseCase, when call() is invoked with valid parameters, then it delegates to repository.updateGoal() and returns the updated GroupGoal

stories.title: Create EditGoalBloc, EditGoalPage and register edit goal route in lib/core/router/app_router.dart
stories.description:
Create the complete EditGoal feature including BLoC (with separate event/state files), the EditGoalPage UI, and route registration following the existing CreateGoal pattern.

ğŸ”’ **SCOPE BOUNDARY:**
- You can ONLY create/modify files listed below
- Creating ANY other file is a scope violation

ğŸ“ **FILES:**
- Read: lib/features/goals/presentation/bloc/create_goal_bloc.dart, lib/features/goals/presentation/bloc/create_goal_event.dart, lib/features/goals/presentation/bloc/create_goal_state.dart, lib/features/goals/presentation/pages/create_goal_page.dart, lib/features/goals/presentation/widgets/goal_form.dart, lib/core/router/app_router.dart, lib/core/router/route_names.dart, lib/core/di/injection_container.dart
- Modify: lib/core/router/app_router.dart, lib/core/router/route_names.dart, lib/core/di/injection_container.dart
- Create: lib/features/goals/presentation/bloc/edit_goal_bloc.dart, lib/features/goals/presentation/bloc/edit_goal_event.dart, lib/features/goals/presentation/bloc/edit_goal_state.dart, lib/features/goals/presentation/pages/edit_goal_page.dart

ğŸ”§ **PATTERNS TO USE:**
- Use `CreateGoalBloc` from lib/features/goals/presentation/bloc/create_goal_bloc.dart as template for EditGoalBloc
- Use sealed class pattern for EditGoalEvent and EditGoalState (Dart 3 feature)
- Use `GoalForm` widget from lib/features/goals/presentation/widgets/goal_form.dart with pre-filled values
- Register in injection_container.dart: `sl.registerFactory<EditGoalBloc>(() => EditGoalBloc(updateGoalUseCase: sl<UpdateGoalUseCase>(), getGoalDetailsUseCase: sl<GetGoalDetailsUseCase>()))`
- Add route: `static const String editGoal = '/goals/edit';` in RouteNames
- Router pattern: `GoRoute(path: RouteNames.editGoal, name: 'editGoal', builder: (context, state) { final goalId = state.uri.queryParameters['goalId'] ?? ''; return BlocProvider(create: (_) => sl<EditGoalBloc>()..add(EditGoalLoadRequested(goalId: goalId)), child: EditGoalPage(goalId: goalId));})`

ğŸ“¦ **REQUIRED EVENTS:**
- EditGoalLoadRequested(goalId) - Load existing goal data
- EditGoalSubmitted(goalId, name, description, targetSteps, startDate, endDate)
- EditGoalReset() - Reset form state

ğŸ“¦ **REQUIRED STATES:**
- EditGoalInitial
- EditGoalLoading
- EditGoalLoaded(goal: GroupGoal)
- EditGoalSubmitting
- EditGoalSuccess(goal: GroupGoal)
- EditGoalError(message: String)

âš ï¸ **ANTI-PATTERNS TO AVOID:**
- Not using sealed classes for events/states
- Not extending Equatable for states
- Creating form from scratch instead of reusing GoalForm with initialValues
- Not registering bloc in injection_container.dart

ğŸ¯ **FUNCTIONAL REQUIREMENTS:**
- EditGoalPage must show loading indicator while fetching existing goal data
- Form fields must be pre-populated with existing goal values
- Submit button should say 'Update Goal' not 'Create Goal'
- On success, show snackbar and pop back to goal detail page
- On error, show snackbar with error message

ğŸ§ª **VERIFICATION:**
- Run: flutter analyze lib/features/goals/presentation/bloc/edit_goal* lib/features/goals/presentation/pages/edit_goal_page.dart
- Run: flutter analyze lib/core/router/
- Check: No analysis errors
- Verify: Route is registered correctly in app_router.dart
acceptanceCriteria: Given the RouteNames class, when editGoal constant is added, then it equals '/goals/edit'
Given the AppRouter, when editGoal route is registered, then it accepts goalId query parameter and wraps EditGoalPage with BlocProvider<EditGoalBloc>
Given the EditGoalBloc, when EditGoalLoadRequested event is added, then it emits EditGoalLoading followed by EditGoalLoaded with the goal data
Given the EditGoalPage, when loaded with goalId, then it displays the GoalForm pre-populated with existing goal values and an 'Update Goal' submit button

stories.title: Create AnimatedProgressChart widget using fl_chart and enhance goal_detail_page.dart with edit button

ğŸ¯ **FUNCTIONAL REQUIREMENTS:**

- X-axis: dates over the goal period

stories.title: Create RealtimeProgressIndicator widget and enhance GoalCard and goals list pages with live updates
stories.description:
Create a new RealtimeProgressIndicator widget that shows live progress updates, enhance GoalProgressIndicator with animation support, and integrate the enhanced UI across goals list and rankings pages.

ğŸ”’ **SCOPE BOUNDARY:**
- You can ONLY create/modify files listed below
- Creating ANY other file is a scope violation

ğŸ“ **FILES:**
- Read: lib/features/goals/presentation/widgets/goal_progress_indicator.dart, lib/features/goals/presentation/widgets/goal_card.dart, lib/features/goals/presentation/pages/goals_list_page.dart, lib/features/goals/presentation/pages/goal_rankings_page.dart, lib/features/goals/domain/entities/realtime_goal_update.dart
- Modify: lib/features/goals/presentation/widgets/goal_progress_indicator.dart, lib/features/goals/presentation/widgets/goal_card.dart, lib/features/goals/presentation/pages/goals_list_page.dart, lib/features/goals/presentation/pages/goal_rankings_page.dart
- Create: lib/features/goals/presentation/widgets/realtime_progress_indicator.dart

ğŸ”§ **PATTERNS TO USE:**
- Use `GoalProgressIndicator` from lib/features/goals/presentation/widgets/goal_progress_indicator.dart as base
- Use TweenAnimationBuilder for smooth progress transitions
- Use Stream-based approach for realtime updates (similar to RealtimeGoalUpdate entity pattern)
- AnimatedContainer for size/color transitions

ğŸ“¦ **REQUIRED REALTIME FEATURES:**
- RealtimeProgressIndicator wraps GoalProgressIndicator with animation support
- Smooth progress value transitions using TweenAnimationBuilder
- Pulse animation when new update received
- Optional `showDelta` parameter to display step count change (+500 steps)
- Color flash animation on progress update

ğŸ“¦ **REQUIRED ENHANCEMENTS:**
- GoalProgressIndicator: Add `animate` parameter (default: false) for animated drawing
- GoalProgressIndicator: Add `animationDuration` parameter (default: Duration(milliseconds: 800))
- GoalCard: Add optional `onLongPress` callback for quick actions
- GoalCard: Show last updated timestamp if available
- goals_list_page: Add filter chips for Active/Completed/All goals
- goal_rankings_page: Add animated rank change indicators (up/down arrows)

âš ï¸ **ANTI-PATTERNS TO AVOID:**
- Using setState for animations instead of TweenAnimationBuilder or AnimationController
- Not disposing animation controllers properly
- Blocking UI during progress updates
- Not using Theme colors for consistency
- Hardcoding animation durations

ğŸ¯ **FUNCTIONAL REQUIREMENTS:**
- Progress value changes animate smoothly over 500ms
- Pulse effect on update: scale 1.0 -> 1.05 -> 1.0 over 300ms
- Filter chips in goals_list_page: All (default), Active, Completed
- Filtering happens locally without re-fetching
- Rank change arrows: green up arrow for rank improvement, red down for rank drop

- Verify: Progress indicator animates when progress value changes

Given the GoalProgressIndicator widget, when animate parameter is true, then it draws the progress arc with animation over animationDuration
Given the GoalCard widget, when onLongPress callback is provided, then long pressing the card triggers the callback
Given the goals_list_page, when filter chips are displayed, then tapping Active shows only active goals, Completed shows only completed goals, All shows all goals
